name: Domestic R&D researchers for companies with 1–9 employees, by selected industry and education level: 2017
description: Domestic R&D researchers for companies with 1–9 employees, by selected industry and education level: 2017

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_researchers_including_r_d_scientists_engineers_and_their_managers_
variableMeasured.description: Researchers Including R D Scientists Engineers And Their Managers

variableMeasured.name: field_researchers_with_phd_excluding_md_jd_and_edd_
variableMeasured.description: Researchers With Phd Excluding Md Jd And Edd

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States that performed or funded R&D.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and U.S. Census Bureau, Annual Business Survey, 2017.
